properties.name: supmap.properties.app-email
properties.description: The email address used by the contact service to send friend requests, connection notifications, and social interaction updates to users.

properties.name: supmap.properties.database-name
properties.description: The name of the MongoDB database used by the contact service to store user relationships, friend connections, and community interactions.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-password
properties.description: Password for authenticating with the Elasticsearch instance used for indexing and searching user social connections and interactions.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-url
properties.description: URL endpoint for the Elasticsearch service used for efficient querying of user relationships and contact networks.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-username
properties.description: Username for authenticating with the Elasticsearch instance used for user relationships and contact data indexing.

properties.name: supmap.properties.kafka-bootstrap-servers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of host:port pairs for establishing the initial connection to the Kafka cluster for contact and social interaction events.

properties.name: supmap.properties.mail-modified-username
properties.description: Template or subject line used in emails sent to users when their contact's username has been modified.

properties.name: supmap.properties.mail-password
properties.description: Password for the email account used by the application to send contact-related notifications and alerts to users.

properties.name: supmap.properties.mongo-uri
properties.description: Connection string URI for the MongoDB database, including authentication credentials if required.
